mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.asn_no AS "asnNo", a.logistic_no AS "logisticNo", a.asn_type AS "asnType", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.fm_eta AS "fmEta", a.to_eta AS "toEta", a.priority AS "priority", a.status AS "status", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.audit_op AS "auditOp", a.audit_time AS "auditTime", a.hold_status AS "holdStatus", a.hold_op AS "holdOp", a.hold_time AS "holdTime", a.qc_status AS "qcStatus", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.supplier_code AS "supplierCode", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.settle_code AS "settleCode", a.print_num AS "printNum", a.is_appoint_dock AS "isAppointDock", a.edi_send_time AS "ediSendTime", a.is_edi_send AS "isEdiSend", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.def6 AS "def6", a.def7 AS "def7", a.def8 AS "def8", a.def9 AS "def9", a.def10 AS "def10", a.def11 AS "def11", a.def12 AS "def12", a.def13 AS "def13", a.def14 AS "def14", a.def15 AS "def15", a.def16 AS "def16", a.def17 AS "def17", a.def18 AS "def18", a.def19 AS "def19", a.def20 AS "def20", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.freight_amount AS "freightAmount", a.driver AS "driver", a.vehicle_no AS "vehicleNo", a.tel AS "tel", a.data_source AS "dataSource"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so on a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user creater on creater.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updater on updater.id = a.update_by
mapper.select: SELECT , owner.ebcu_name_cn AS ownerName, supplier.ebcu_name_cn AS supplierName, supplier.ebcu_tel AS supplierTel, supplier.ebcu_fax AS supplierFax, supplier.ebcu_address AS supplierAddress, supplier.ebcu_industry_type AS supplierIndustryType, carrier.ebcu_name_cn AS carrierName, carrier.ebcu_tel AS carrierTel, carrier.ebcu_fax AS carrierFax, carrier.ebcu_address AS carrierAddress, carrier.ebcu_industry_type AS carrierIndustryType, settle.ebcu_name_cn AS settleName, settle.ebcu_tel AS settleTel, settle.ebcu_fax AS settleFax, settle.ebcu_address AS settleAddress, settle.ebcu_industry_type AS settleIndustryType FROM wm_asn_header a LEFT JOIN eb_customer owner ON a.owner_code = owner.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = owner.org_id AND FIND_IN_SET('OWNER', owner.ebcu_type) LEFT JOIN eb_customer supplier ON a.supplier_code = supplier.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = supplier.org_id AND FIND_IN_SET('SUPPLIER', supplier.ebcu_type) LEFT JOIN eb_customer carrier ON a.carrier_code = carrier.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = carrier.org_id AND FIND_IN_SET('CARRIER', carrier.ebcu_type) LEFT JOIN eb_customer settle ON a.settle_code = settle.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = settle.org_id AND FIND_IN_SET('SETTLEMENT', settle.ebcu_type) WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_asn_header( id, asn_no, logistic_no, asn_type, order_time, fm_eta, to_eta, priority, status, audit_status, audit_op, audit_time, hold_status, hold_op, hold_time, qc_status, owner_code, supplier_code, carrier_code, settle_code, print_num, is_appoint_dock, edi_send_time, is_edi_send, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, def6, def7, def8, def9, def10, def11, def12, def13, def14, def15, def16, def17, def18, def19, def20, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id, freight_amount, driver, vehicle_no, tel, data_source ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{asnNo}, #{logisticNo}, #{asnType}, #{orderTime}, #{fmEta}, #{toEta}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditOp}, #{auditTime}, #{holdStatus}, #{holdOp}, #{holdTime}, #{qcStatus}, #{ownerCode}, #{supplierCode}, #{carrierCode}, #{settleCode}, #{printNum}, #{isAppointDock}, #{ediSendTime}, #{isEdiSend}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10}, #{def11}, #{def12}, #{def13}, #{def14}, #{def15}, #{def16}, #{def17}, #{def18}, #{def19}, #{def20}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{freightAmount}, #{driver}, #{vehicleNo}, #{tel}, #{dataSource} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_asn_header SET asn_no = #{asnNo}, logistic_no = #{logisticNo}, asn_type = #{asnType}, order_time = #{orderTime}, fm_eta = #{fmEta}, to_eta = #{toEta}, priority = #{priority}, status = #{status}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_op = #{auditOp}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, hold_status = #{holdStatus}, hold_op = #{holdOp}, hold_time = #{holdTime}, qc_status = #{qcStatus}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, supplier_code = #{supplierCode}, carrier_code = #{carrierCode}, settle_code = #{settleCode}, print_num = #{printNum}, is_appoint_dock = #{isAppointDock}, edi_send_time = #{ediSendTime}, is_edi_send = #{isEdiSend}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}, def7 = #{def7}, def8 = #{def8}, def9 = #{def9}, def10 = #{def10}, def11 = #{def11}, def12 = #{def12}, def13 = #{def13}, def14 = #{def14}, def15 = #{def15}, def16 = #{def16}, def17 = #{def17}, def18 = #{def18}, def19 = #{def19}, def20 = #{def20}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, freight_amount = #{freightAmount}, driver = #{driver}, vehicle_no = #{vehicleNo}, tel = #{tel}, data_source = #{dataSource} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select:
SELECT wah.id FROM wm_asn_header wah WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_qc_header wqh WHERE wqh.order_no = wah.asn_no AND wqh.org_id = wah.org_id)
AND wah.id IN
#{orderId}
AND false
mapper.update:
UPDATE wm_asn_header SET audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_op = #{auditOp}, audit_time = sysdate() WHERE status = '00' AND hold_status = '00' AND id IN
#{orderId}

UPDATE wm_asn_header set hold_status = #{holdStatus}, hold_op = #{holdOp}, hold_time = sysdate() WHERE id IN
#{orderId}

UPDATE wm_asn_header wah SET wah.status = (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(wmad.status) = '90' THEN '90' WHEN MIN(wmad.status) = '20' THEN '20' WHEN MIN(wmad.status) = '10' THEN '10' WHEN (MAX(wmad.status) = '10' OR MAX(wmad.status) = '20') AND MIN(wmad.status) = '00' THEN '10' ELSE '00'END status FROM wm_asn_detail wmad WHERE wmad.status != '90' AND wmad.asn_no = #{asnNo} AND wmad.org_id = #{orgId}) WHERE wah.asn_no = #{asnNo} AND wah.org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wm_asn_header WHERE asn_no = #{asnNo} AND org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select:
SELECT wah.id AS id, wah.asn_no AS asnNo FROM wm_asn_header wah
AND wah.id IN
#{asnId}
AND wah.status IN
#{status}
AND wah.hold_status IN
#{holdStatus}
AND wah.audit_status IN
#{auditStatus}
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail wad WHERE wad.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wad.org_id = wah.org_id AND wad.is_palletize = #{isPalletize})
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.status = '20' AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND (wadr.voucher_no IS NULL OR wadr.voucher_no = '')
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.status = '20' AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND (wadr.voucher_no IS NULL OR wadr.voucher_no = '')
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND wadr.plan_pa_loc IS NOT NULL AND wadr.plan_pa_loc != '')
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND wadr.plan_pa_loc IS NOT NULL AND wadr.plan_pa_loc != '')
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND wadr.cd_Type IS NOT NULL AND wadr.cd_Type != '')
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wm_asn_detail_receive wadr WHERE wadr.asn_no = wah.asn_no AND wadr.org_id = wah.org_id AND wadr.cd_Type IS NOT NULL AND wadr.cd_Type != '')

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(wmad.id) FROM wm_asn_detail wmad LEFT JOIN wm_asn_header wmah ON wmad.asn_no = wmah.asn_no AND wmad.org_id = wmah.org_id WHERE wmad.asn_no = #{asnNo} AND wmad.STATUS >= '00' AND wmad.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.STATUS >= '00' AND wmah.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.audit_status = '99' AND wmad.org_id = #{orgId}) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(wmad.id) FROM wm_asn_detail wmad LEFT JOIN wm_asn_header wmah ON wmad.asn_no = wmah.asn_no AND wmad.org_id = wmah.org_id WHERE wmad.asn_no = #{asnNo} AND wmad.STATUS >= '00' AND wmad.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.STATUS >= '00' AND wmah.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.audit_status = '99' AND wmad.org_id = #{orgId} AND wmad.is_palletize = 'Y') AS isPal, (SELECT COUNT(wmad.id) FROM wm_asn_detail wmad LEFT JOIN wm_asn_header wmah ON wmad.asn_no = wmah.asn_no AND wmad.org_id = wmah.org_id WHERE wmad.asn_no = #{asnNo} AND wmad.STATUS >= '00' AND wmad.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.STATUS >= '00' AND wmah.STATUS < '20' AND wmah.audit_status = '99' AND wmad.org_id = #{orgId} AND wmad.is_palletize = 'N') AS neverPal FROM dual
